item.title: Life Crafting
item.description: Introduction The importance of self-determined and self-motivated goals cannot be stressed enough. Goal attainment that fulfill basic needs and are aligned with one’s values and passions are related to greater wellbeing, higher levels of meaningfulness and lower symptoms of depression. An increasing number of young people experience mental health problems and there is a lot of interest in the topic of meaning and purpose which shows promising results. People with a purpose in life feel less stressed when making important decisions and are better at regulating their emotions which improves their mental health.
